scripts.install:pods: if [ -z "$DOCKER_ENV" ]; then cd packages/mobile/ios && pod install; fi
scripts.rm: yarn workspaces run rm && yarn cache clean && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.rm:docker: docker stop $(docker ps -q); docker system prune -a
scripts.compile: yarn workspace @oky/core compile && yarn workspaces run compile
scripts.dev: yarn run clean && yarn run compile && concurrently --kill-others "docker-compose up" "yarn workspace @oky/app start"
scripts.dev:mobile: yarn run clean && yarn run compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @oky/mobile compile -w" "yarn workspace @oky/mobile start"
scripts.prod:web: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up
scripts.test:all: yarn run test:saga && yarn run test:prediction-engine
scripts.reverse:all-ports: adb reverse tcp:3000 tcp:3000 && adb reverse tcp:5000 tcp:5000 && adb reverse tcp:8000 tcp:8000 && adb reverse tcp:8080 tcp:8080 && adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081
scripts.postinstall: yarn install:pods && test -n "$NOYARNPOSTINSTALL" || (patch-package && jetifier && sed -e 's:node ./node_modules/react-native/cli.js config:yarn run --silent react-native config:g' -i.bak node_modules/@react-native-community/cli-platform-android/native_modules.gradle)
scripts.run:android: yarn clean:mobile && yarn workspace @oky/mobile run android && yarn reverse:all-ports
